CODE COMPARATIVE TABLE - 1979 CODE
This table gives the location within Part II of this Code of those sections of Division 2 of the 1979 Code, as supplemented through November 23, 1983, which are included herein. Sections of Division 2 of the 1979 Code, as supplemented, not listed herein have been omitted as repealed, superseded, obsolete, or not of a general and permanent nature. For the location of ordinances adopted subsequent thereto, see the table immediately following this table.
EXPAND
1979
Section Section
this Code
